text: Chicken Rice War was a 2000 Singaporean romantic comedy movie. It was directed by Chee Kong Cheah (CheeK) and based on the play Romeo and Juliet by William Shakespeare. It starred Pierre Png, Alias Kadir, May Yee Lum, Tanya Chua, Jamie Yeo, Catherine Sng, Gary Yuen, Kevlin Ng. ==Other websites== * Category:2000 romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Singaporean movies
title: Chicken Rice War
